definition: colloquial reading for 落[luo4] in certain compounds
to fall or drop/(of the sun) to set/(of a tide) to go out/to lower/to decline or sink/to lag or fall behind/to fall onto/to rest with/to get or receive/to write down/whereabouts/settlement
to leave out/to be missing/to leave behind or forget to bring/to lag or fall behind

sentences.english: Siheyuan is the traditional courtyard-style residence of Beijing.
sentences.chinese: 四合院是北京傳統的院落式住宅形式。

sentences.english: The masked men ghosted across the moonlit yard.
sentences.chinese: 蒙面人像幽靈一般穿過月光下的院落。

sentences.english: You can't look down upon these courtyards, it took more time than any buildings.
sentences.chinese: “別小看這些院落，建的時辰，可比蓋樓費功夫”。

sentences.english: Jackals cry in chorus from the courtyard of the deserted house in the light of the worn-out moon.
sentences.chinese: 疲憊的月光中，豺狼在被廢棄的院落中齊聲嗥叫。

sentences.english: This is a Chinese courtyard of the compound, exchanging rain, the green.
sentences.chinese: 這是一箇中國四合院式的院落，桃李滿園，綠意盎然。

sentences.english: Courtyard area of the figure one-third acres of housing, there are trees and lawns.
sentences.chinese: 圖中房屋院落佔地三分之一英畝，有樹木和草坪。

sentences.english: The technique of courtyard is also used in dining and meeting center and hot spring bath center.
sentences.chinese: 院落的處理同樣表現於餐飲會議中心與溫泉洗浴中心。

sentences.english: Coincident with the external tank mix landscape and spatial relationships within the courtyard.
sentences.chinese: 箱體組合暗合了外部的景觀與內部的院落空間關係。

sentences.english: Walking into the Courtyard 7, you will feel and smell its antiquity and rusticity .
sentences.chinese: 走進七號院，您將感受到院落的古老和質樸。

sentences.english: In addition walls and other surfaces in family compounds have been cleaned.
sentences.chinese: 此外，對家庭院落的牆壁和其它表面進行清理。

sentences.english: The moon gate divided the whole courtyard into inner and outer portions.
sentences.chinese: 月亮門把整個院落分成了裏院和外院。

definition: courtyard house with a fully enclosed courtyard (type of Chinese residence)
courtyard/atrium/opening in a roof/skylight/caisson ceiling/(TCM) acupuncture point TB10
residence consisting of structures surrounding a courtyard on three sides
winding corridor/cloister/ambulatory (covered walkway around a cloister)
